column2: "Medze m’akoma nyina bɛda EWURADZE ase; Mibeyi w’anwanwa dwuma nyinara akyerɛ."
"Wo mu na mebɛgye m’enyi na medzi ehurusi: Mobɔtow ayɛyindwom ama wo dzin
"Osiandɛ m’atamfo asan ekyir
"Na ɔwo edzi m’asɛm ebu me bem; Ɔwo atsena ahengua do ebu atsɛntsenenee."
"Ɔwo na aka amanaman enyim
column4: Ɔwo na apepa hɔn edzin korakorakora."

column2: "Atamfo ewiei aba
column3: wɔayɛ amamfo nwionn nwionn; Hɔn ase ahyew koraa."

column2: "Na EWURADZE dze
column3: ɔtse n’ahengua do dɛ ɔhen daa; Ɔdze n’egua esi hɔ rubu atsɛn."

column2: "Na ɔno na obobu wiadze atsɛn wɔ tsenenee mu
column3: Obobua amanaman atsɛn wɔ dza ɔtsen mu."

column2: "EWURADZE bɛyɛ abantsentsen ama nyia wɔtseetsee no
"Na hɔn a wonyim wo dzin dze
column3: wɔdze hɔn werɛ bɛhyɛ wo mu; Osiandɛ ɔwo
column5: enndaan hɔn a wɔhwehwɛ wo nngyae da."

column2: "Hom ntow ayɛyindwom mma EWURADZE a ɔtse Zion: Hom nka ne ndzeyɛɛ nkyerɛ aman."
"Na nyia oridzi bɔgya ho wer no ɔkaa hɔn: No werɛ mmfir abrɛfo sufrɛ."
"EWURADZE
column3: hu me mbɔbɔr; Hwɛ m’ahohia a muruhu a ofir hɔn a wokyir me
column4: Ɔwo ama me do fi owu aponkɛse ano;"

column2: "Ama maaka w’ayɛyi nyinara akyerɛ: Wɔ Zion babaa aponkɛse mu
column3: Mibedzi ehurusi wɔ wo nkwagye mu."

column2: "Amanaman amem wɔ mona a wotui no mu: Efir a wosuae sumae no apa hɔnankasa hɔn anan."
"EWURADZE ada noho edzi
column3: oebu atsɛn: Ɔdze ɔdzebɔnyɛnyi nankasa ne nsaano edwuma esua no efir."

column2: "Emumuyɛfo besian akɔ samanadze
column3: Mekyerɛ amanaman a hɔn werɛ fir Nyankopɔn nyinara."

column2: "Na no werɛ rimmfir ohianyi daa
column3: Eso ɔbɔbɔnyi enyidado rennyɛ gyan daa."

column2: "EWURADZE
column3: soɛr; mma mma ɔdasanyi nndzi nyim: Ma wombu amanaman atsɛn wɔ w’enyim."

column2: "EWURADZE
column3: yi hɔn hu: Ma amanaman nhu hɔnho dɛ wɔyɛ nyimpa ara."
